name: RÃ¶ssler system
equations: dx/dt = -y - z; dy/dt = x + a y; dz/dt = b + z (x - c)
description_simple: A three-dimensional deterministic dynamical system that exhibits chaotic behavior for certain parameter values.
description_complex: A continuous-time nonlinear dynamical system defined by three coupled first-order differential equations. For the standard parameter choice a = 0.2, b = 0.2, c = 5.7, the system displays deterministic chaos with a strange attractor, positive largest Lyapunov exponent, and sensitive dependence on initial conditions.
